# Extendicare Maintenance Inspection Checklist## Equipment: Water Softener### LEGEND/KEY| LEGEND | KEY         |
|--------|-------------|
| W      | Weekly      |
| M      | Monthly     |
| Q      | Quarterly   |
| S      | Semi-Annual |
| A      | Annual      |### CHECKS| W | M | Q | S | A | Item                                         |
|---|---|---|---|---|----------------------------------------------|
| X |   |   |   |   | 1. Top up softener with salt and record   |
|   | X |   |   |   | 2. Clean all controls. |
|   |   | X |   |   | 3. Work at valves through full travel of the stem. |
|   |   |   | X |   | 4. Clean out brine tank. |### Monthly Schedule|     | JAN | FEB | MAR | APR | MAY | JUN | |
